game.name: Creepy Day
game.description:
Again we have brought to you an amazing endless isometric flappy game where you have to control a small and cute character in the sky! Are you ready to accept this challenge and show off the world that you can bring the smile on the face of any character by scoring high? Join Creepy Day and be prepared to give this character the freedom to fly in the sky for long! The longer it will stay in the air; the higher score you will be able to make for it.

When you click the play button, you would see it in the air. Click or tap the screen to help it get through all of the obstacles you see along the way in this HTML5 point and click game! This character looks very sad, but it is up to you to use your skill to collect some enough money for it to smile again. Make sure to collect as much money as you can to boost your score and use it late to purchase new upgrades.

Track your score by keeping your eyes at the top right corner of the screen in this cool puzzle challenge! Explore the menu and mute the sound by using the icons shown on the top left corner of the screen! Our website is full of amazing free arcade games that are playable on multiple devices including desktops, mobile phones, tablets as well as iPads or iPhones. Good luck to have a wonderful blast with your friends and families without download games in your devices!
